metadata.name: Supreme Court Petition
metadata.description: Petition template for filing before the Supreme Court of India under Article 32/136 of the Constitution. Follows Supreme Court Rules 2013 formatting standards.

required_fields.label: Petitioner Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the petitioner filing the petition

required_fields.label: Petitioner Address
required_fields.description: Complete address of the petitioner for service

required_fields.label: Respondent Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the respondent against whom petition is filed
required_fields.example: Union of India through Secretary, Ministry of Home Affairs

required_fields.label: Respondent Address
required_fields.description: Complete address of the respondent for service
required_fields.example: North Block, Central Secretariat, New Delhi - 110001

required_fields.label: Cause of Action
required_fields.description: Facts giving rise to the petition and when the cause of action arose
required_fields.example: The impugned notification dated 01.01.2024 violates Article 14 and 21 of the Constitution. Cause of action arose on 01.01.2024 at New Delhi.

required_fields.label: Relief Sought
required_fields.description: Specific reliefs and prayers being sought from the Court
required_fields.example: a) Declare the impugned notification unconstitutional; b) Issue writ of mandamus; c) Grant costs

required_fields.label: Jurisdiction Ground
required_fields.description: Legal basis for the Supreme Court's jurisdiction
required_fields.example: Article 32 of the Constitution of India for enforcement of fundamental rights

optional_fields.label: Interim Relief
optional_fields.description: Any interim or ad-interim reliefs sought pending final disposal
optional_fields.example: Stay of operation of the impugned notification pending final hearing

optional_fields.label: Court Fee Details
optional_fields.description: Details of court fee stamps affixed on the petition

template_content:
IN THE SUPREME COURT OF INDIA
[CIVIL/CRIMINAL] [ORIGINAL/APPELLATE] JURISDICTION

[WRIT PETITION (CIVIL)/SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION] NO. _____ OF _____

IN THE MATTER OF:

{petitioner_name}
{petitioner_address}
... Petitioner(s)

VERSUS

{respondent_name}
{respondent_address}
... Respondent(s)

PETITION UNDER ARTICLE _____ OF THE CONSTITUTION OF INDIA

TO,
THE HON'BLE CHIEF JUSTICE OF INDIA AND HIS COMPANION JUDGES OF THE SUPREME COURT OF INDIA

THE HUMBLE PETITION OF THE PETITIONER ABOVE-NAMED

MOST RESPECTFULLY SHOWETH:

1. PARTIES:
[Description of parties]

2. JURISDICTION:
{jurisdiction_ground}

3. FACTS:
[Detailed facts]

4. CAUSE OF ACTION:
{cause_of_action}

5. GROUNDS:
[Legal grounds with numbered paragraphs]

6. PRAYER:
In the facts and circumstances stated above, it is most respectfully prayed that this Hon'ble Court may graciously be pleased to:

{relief_sought}

And for this act of kindness, the petitioner shall forever pray.

PETITIONER
Through Counsel
